item.title: alan的python作品
item.description: 我是alan，這是我利用python來做出撲克牌21點遊戲，玩家可遵循指引和電腦莊家有所交流 (在這裡我不使用Python的程式原型是因為黑字會被背景覆蓋掉) python作品

import random def printcard(c): for i in c: if i //13==0: print(chr(9824),end="") elif i //13==1: print(chr(9829),end="") elif i//13==2: print(chr(9830),end="") else: print(chr(9827),end="") if i%13==0: print("A",end=" ") elif i%13==10: print("J",end=" ") elif i%13==11: print("Q",end=" ") elif i%13==12: print("K",end=" ") else: print(i%13+1,end=" ") print() def printmassage(): print("玩家的排:",end="") printcard(playercard) print("玩家的牌面點數:",sum(playerpoint)) print("莊家的排:",end="") printcard(bankercard) print("裝家的排面點數:",sum(bankerpoint)) print("***********************************************") def cardpoint(x): if x%13==0: return 11 elif x%13>9: return 10 else: return x%13+1 def deal(gamercard,gamerpoint): temp=card.
title: “承翰的第一篇文章” date: 2022-04-17T14:00:47+08:00 draft: false post thumb image: “images/post/post-3.jpg”
